医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 向加州大学洛杉矶分校 (UCLA) 拨款 210 万美元，用于结束艾滋病毒流行美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 向加州大学洛杉矶分校艾滋病毒识别、预防和治疗服务中心 (CHIPTS) 和加州大学洛杉矶分校-基民盟艾滋病研究中心 (CFAR) 拨款 210 万美元，以支持四个研究项目和一个实施科学咨询中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/NIH-awards-2421-million-to-UCLA-to-end-the-HIV-epidemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/NIH-awards-2421-million-to-UCLA-to-end-the-HIV-epidemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31830827-3c31-43d3-85b4-7fabc4620aac Thu, 02 Nov 2023 15:28:15 -0400 NIH awards $2.1 million to UCLA to end the HIV epidemic
研究发现阿片类药物治疗疼痛的处方存在巨大的种族差异格林威治大学的这项新研究查看了 1999 年至 2020 年美国急诊科的数据，发现黑人和白人患者的疼痛治疗方式存在显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Study-finds-substantial-racial-disparities-in-opioid-prescribing-for-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Study-finds-substantial-racial-disparities-in-opioid-prescribing-for-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff480daf-3cd2-4ad3-83e0-a46e833fa71d Thu, 02 Nov 2023 15:23:15 -0400 Study finds substantial racial disparities in opioid prescribing for pain
慕尼黑大学医学科学家发现警报素释放新机制慕尼黑大学医学科学家证明，在免疫反应的早期阶段，重要的促炎介质通过细胞膜上的微小孔释放到血液中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/LMU-medical-scientists-discover-new-mechanism-of-alarmin-release.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/LMU-medical-scientists-discover-new-mechanism-of-alarmin-release.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92820f2b-8b50-4a6e-8445-56a0e7c53637 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 15:05:54 -0400 LMU medical scientists discover new mechanism of alarmin release
在疾病检测中，尿液生物标志物比血浆生物标志物表现出更强的性能近几十年来，生物标志物研究的重点集中在血液标志物上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Urinary-biomarkers-can-show-enhanced-performance-than-plasma-biomarkers-in-disease-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Urinary-biomarkers-can-show-enhanced-performance-than-plasma-biomarkers-in-disease-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd684c46-f7a5-40a9-9b21-e057c05b9b5f Thu, 02 Nov 2023 15:00:50 -0400 Urinary biomarkers can show enhanced performance than plasma biomarkers in disease detection
研究强调缺乏解决工作年龄人群视力丧失问题的临床研究一项新的研究强调，缺乏临床研究来解决英国劳动年龄人口严重视力障碍 (SSI) 的主要原因，这每年给英国经济造成约 74 亿英镑的损失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Study-highlights-lack-of-clinical-research-to-address-sight-loss-in-working-age-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Study-highlights-lack-of-clinical-research-to-address-sight-loss-in-working-age-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2aa99d3-a163-4599-b179-6c1476008fd5 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 14:55:06 -0400 Study highlights lack of clinical research to address sight loss in working-age people
新评分可高精度预测术后肝衰竭风险手术切除部分肝脏仍然是肝癌患者的唯一治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/New-score-predicts-risk-of-postoperative-liver-failure-with-high-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/New-score-predicts-risk-of-postoperative-liver-failure-with-high-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eac758d2-64eb-47cc-b412-129a785495ee Thu, 02 Nov 2023 14:48:47 -0400 New score predicts risk of postoperative liver failure with high accuracy
全新智能数据理念，帮助内科疾病患者更加活跃，过上更好的生活建立基于人工智能的数字辅助系统来支持患者/美因茨大学运动医学研究小组参与了由美因茨大学医学中心协调的两个项目。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/New-smart-data-concept-to-help-患者-with-internal-diseases-get-more-active-and-live-better-lives。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/New-smart-data-concept-to-help-患者-with-internal-diseases-get-more-active-and-live-better-lives。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b6a6a15-a354-44e7-9d64-c4ab7e80781c Thu, 02 Nov 2023 12:59:14 -0400 New smart data concept to help patients with internal diseases get more active and live better lives
医疗债务正在从美国人的信用报告中消失，分数提高非营利性城市研究所的一项新分析显示，随着主要信用评级机构取消了小额未付账单和不到一年的债务，过去一年中，美国消费者信用报告上有医疗债务的比例大幅下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Medical-debt-is-disappearing-from-Americanse28099-credit-reports-lifting-scores.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Medical-debt-is-disappearing-from-Americanse28099-credit-reports-lifting-scores.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b907580-eaf8-4e2d-8479-bbb601fd6bcd Thu, 02 Nov 2023 12:27:41 -0400 Medical debt is disappearing from Americans’ credit reports, lifting scores
“比人们想象的更糟糕”：医疗补助“放松”在各州引发混乱蒙大拿州公共援助办公室开放前，有两打多人在办公室外排队，以确保他们的医疗补助不会被切断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/e28098比-people-can-imaginee28099-Medicaid-e28098unwindinge28099-breeds-chaos-in-states.aspx更糟糕https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/e28098比-people-can-imaginee28099-Medicaid-e28098unwindinge28099-breeds-chaos-in-states.aspx#comment更糟糕https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb23b9c6-818a-4576-8784-439fbbc7a906 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 12:24:50 -0400 ‘Worse than people can imagine’: Medicaid ‘unwinding’ breeds chaos in states
科学、创新与异种移植：与秦文宁博士的讨论在这次采访中，我们深入探讨了异种移植的先驱世界和基因编辑不断发展的前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Science-Innovation-and-Xenotransplantation-A-Discussion-with-Dr-Wenning-Qin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Science-Innovation-and-Xenotransplantation-A-Discussion-with-Dr-Wenning-Qin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=168efa49-ad88-4b77-91c4-5ca7f9fd61a1 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 12:13:00 -0400 Science, Innovation, and Xenotransplantation: A Discussion with Dr. Wenning Qin
